item.title: Hundreds of American Airlines flights delayed after glitch briefly grounded planes
item.description: American Airlines briefly grounds flights nationwide citing a technical glitch.

item.title: AI and crypto drove gains in this year's top 5 tech stocks
item.description: The promises of artificial intelligence and the rally in crypto prices were the main drivers of the best-performing tech stocks of 2024.

item.title: Starbucks barista strike expands to more than 300 stores in 45 states
item.description: The strike will affect only about 3% of all locations. A barista workers union is aiming to raise worker pay and highlight alleged unfair labor practi...

item.title: FDA raises recall alert to highest level on Costco eggs over risk of severe illness or death due to salmonella
item.description: Regulators warned that eating these eggs could bring "serious adverse health consequences or death.‚Äù

item.title: Former President Bill Clinton released from hospital after being treated for the flu
item.description: Clinton was admitted to a Georgetown hospital with a fever on Monday.
